backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing multiple itinerary and UI update requirements referencing specific frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend files including itinerary data, tabs, components, and PWA behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH theme variables for light/dark mode and applying global background and text styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading main.tsx and registering a service worker for PWA offline support.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, theme colors, start URL, and icons.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy, caching core assets, and managing activation cleanup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing active tab state and rendering tabs, layout, PWA install banner, and bottom tab bar.
frontend/src/components/BottomTabBar.tsx: Bottom navigation bar with four Hindi-labeled tabs and active state styling using lucide-react icons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing Instagram attribution with icon and external link.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper with header branding, gradient background, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallPrompt: Install prompt banner showing iOS or standard instructions, with dismiss and install actions.
frontend/src/config/monetization.ts: Exports WhatsApp number and utility to generate message-encoded WhatsApp URLs.
frontend/src/data/dwarkaGuide.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and provides multi-day Dwarka travel itineraries with places, timings, and optional recommendation cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity via React Query, recreating it when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for login, logout, identity loading, and status management using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Provides logic to detect PWA installability, handle beforeinstallprompt events, and trigger or dismiss the install prompt.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and Dwarka-themed colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/tabs/ConnectivityTab.tsx: Renders transport options from Ahmedabad to Dwarka along with a monetized car/bike rental card and WhatsApp booking link.
frontend/src/tabs/RulesTimingsTab.tsx: Displays temple rules, prohibited items, timings, and general guidelines using data from dwarkaGuide.
frontend/src/tabs/StayFoodTab.tsx: Renders categorized stay and food options using hardcoded data, displaying Dharamshala, mid‑range, luxury hotels, and best food lists with styled cards.
frontend/src/tabs/YatraPlanTab.tsx: Implements a day selector and displays multi-day itineraries as a timeline with times, places, descriptions, and Google Maps links.
frontend/src/utils/googleMaps.ts: Provides a helper function that generates a Google Maps search URL for a given place in Dwarka.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, radius, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, requirements, offline constraints, issues, and feature definitions for the Dwarka Yatra Guide PWA.
